title: Utilities for a Fixed Policy

definitions.utility: expected total discounted rewards starting in s and following π
definitions.recursive_relation: V*(s) = max {a∈s'} Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')] }

formulas: V*(s) = max {a∈s'} Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')] }
summary: The slide defines the utility of a state under a fixed policy and presents the recursive relation for calculating the utility. It includes a diagram illustrating the state transitions and the components involved in the utility calculation.
